DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study demonstrate efficacy nutritional formula patient type 2 diabetes .
DOC.brief_title: Four-Hour Evaluation Medical Food Subjects With Type 2 Diabetes
DOC.criteria: 1 . Subject type 2 diabetes . 2 . Subject 18 year age . 3 . Subject male , nonpregnant , nonlactating female . 4 . Subject 's BMI > 20 kg/m2 < 40 kg/m2 . 5 . Subject 's HbA1c level 6.5 11 % . 6 . If chronic thyroid medication hormone replacement therapy , subject constant dosage least two month prior Screening Visit . 7 . Subject 's weight stable past two month prior Screening Visit . 1 . Subject use exogenous insulin , Byetta alphaglucosidase inhibitor glucose control . 2 . Subject type 1 diabetes . 3 . Subject history diabetic ketoacidosis . 4 . Subject following : current infection ; inpatient surgery receive systemic corticosteroid treatment last 3 month ; antibiotic last 3 week prior screen . 5 . Subject active malignancy . 6 . Subject significant cardiovascular event < 6 month prior study entry history congestive heart failure . 7 . Subject end stage organ failure . 8 . Subject history severe gastroparesis , renal hepatic disease . 9 . Subject active metabolic , hepatic , gastrointestinal disease condition may interfere nutrient absorption , distribution , metabolism , excretion , exclude diabetes . 10 . Subject chronic , contagious , infectious disease . 11 . Taking daily medication dos would interfere nutrient absorption , metabolism , excretion , gastric motility , blood glucose . 12 . Subject faint experienced adverse event response blood collection prior enrollment study . 13 . Clotting bleed disorder . 14 . Allergic intolerant ingredient find test meal .
